items.question: What types of media are compatible with motion tracking?
items.answer: Utilize both static images and video clips for motion tracking, maximizing the potential of your visual assets. Ensure your media is well-prepared for optimal results.

items.question: Can I customize the motion tracking settings?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can fully customize movement parameters including speed, direction, and path to achieve the desired visual effect for your project.

items.question: What are the best practices for media preparation?
items.answer: Use clear and high-resolution images or videos to ensure the best tracking results. The cleaner your backgrounds and focused your subjects are, the better the motion tracking will perform.

items.question: How does motion tracking enhance my videos?
items.answer: Motion tracking creates a dynamic interaction that draws viewers' attention. It can emphasize products and create a visually appealing experience, enhancing user engagement.

items.question: Can I add multiple tracking points to a single video?
items.answer: Yes! You can designate multiple points for motion tracking, leading to more complex and engaging video outputs that capture viewer interest.

items.question: Are there any limits on video generation speed?
items.answer: Typically, video generation occurs within 1-2 minutes, allowing you to quickly utilize and share high-quality content without delay.

items.question: What licensing rights come with generated videos?
items.answer: All videos generated through our platform include commercial rights, allowing unhindered usage across various platforms and applications without extra fees.

items.question: How do updates or changes affect generated videos?
items.answer: Any adjustments can be easily applied, enabling you to refine the motion tracking to suit different campaigns or marketing materials.

items.question: Is technical support available for users?
items.answer: Yes! We provide full support with resources, tutorials, and a dedicated help team to ensure you make the most out of our motion tracking feature.
